TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ua-asik, title = Ua-asik, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ua-asik} }

S.FORM: Ua-asik Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Ua-asik a niyaro', 112 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 347 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 333 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun89%, Amis1%, Cou1%, Paiwan4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Ua-asik Itiniay i Taoyoan Cen no Kaohsiong ko Ua-asik a niyaro', 112 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 347 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 333 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon89%, Amis1%, Coo1%, Paiwan4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
